attributes.action: No to Amnesty for Illegal Immigrants
attributes.additional_details:
No. No. No! - To Amnesty for Illegal Immigrants
To do so will ultimately proove more expensive as other will come here in the hope of future Amnesties being granted.
More money should be devote to deporting those already judged to be here illegally (currently 174,000), and deemed to have no right to remain here.
Please do not take the soft and ultimately expensive option.
